text: Eugene Burger (June 1, 1939 - August 8, 2017) was an American magician. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was known for his close-up skills and his work in mentalism and bizarre magic. He was also a philosopher and a historian of religion. Burger died of liver cancer in Chicago on August 8, 2017 at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Eugene Burger homepage Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Chicago Category:American magicians Category:American philosophers Category:American historians Category:Entertainers from Chicago
title: Eugene Burger
